articles.author: Tassia Sipahutar, John Viljoen
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for November 14 - Bloomberg
articles.description: European stocks and US equity futures posted small moves as traders awaited Tuesday’s US inflation report for confirmation that price pressures slowed last month.
articles.content:
European stocks and US equity futures posted small moves as traders awaited Tuesdays US inflation report for confirmation that price pressures slowed last month.
